√dhā 'suck'

present: dháyati etc. V.+  

perfect: dadhús  

aorist: [1.] adhāt  dheyāt   -- [3.] adadhat   -- [6.] adhāsīt  

future: [1.] dhāsyati   -- [2.] dhātā  

verbal: dhītá  dhā́tave  dhītvā́  -dhī́ya  -dhāya  

secondary: passive: dhīyate   -- intensive: dādhā-  dādhī-  dedhīya-   -- desiderative: dhitsa-   -- causative: dhāpayate etc.  dhāpayati  adīdhapat  

derivatives: -dhā V.+  -dhaya B.+  dhā́tu RV.S.  -dhāyin C.  dhā́yas V.  dhāyú RV.  dhārú AV.  dhāsí RV.S.  dhāsyú AV.  dhénā V.  dhenú V.+  dadhán  dádhi V.+  

Related with √dhi. The connection of some of the derivatives by no means beyond question.
